title: Stumptown Coffee Roasters French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 32 grams of coffee to coarse consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 32g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 512g hot water evenly over grounds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start your timer and pour 512 grams of hot water evenly over the grounds. You have 20 seconds. Make sure to wet all the coffee for a consistent extraction.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Inicia el cronómetro y vierte 512g de agua caliente uniformemente sobre el café.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro y vierte 512 gramos de agua caliente uniformemente. Tienes 20 segundos. Asegura que todo el café esté mojado para una extracción consistente.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir gently with wooden spoon to saturate all grounds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently with a wooden spoon. You have 30 seconds. This ensures all grounds are fully saturated and prevents dry pockets.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Revuelve suavemente con cuchara de madera para saturar todo el café.
brewing_steps.short_instruction_es: Revuelve suave con cuchara de madera
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Revuelve suavemente con una cuchara de madera. Tienes 30 segundos. Esto asegura que todo el café esté completamente saturado y previene bolsillos secos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
brewing_steps.audio_script: Place the lid on top, but do not press the plunger yet. This keeps the heat in for the long steep.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Coloca la tapa encima, no presiones el émbolo.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Coloca la tapa encima, pero no presiones el émbolo todavía. Esto mantiene el calor para el reposo largo.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Now, wait for 6 minutes. This extended time allows the coarse grind to fully extract, resulting in a rich, deep flavor profile.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora, espera 6 minutos. Este tiempo extendido permite que la molienda gruesa extraiga completamente, resultando en un perfil de sabor rico y profundo.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press plunger down slowly, pour immediately
brewing_steps.audio_script: Time to press. Push the plunger down slowly and evenly. Pour immediately into your cup to stop the brewing process.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Presiona el émbolo lentamente, sirve inmediatamente.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Es hora de presionar. Empuja el émbolo hacia abajo lenta y uniformemente. Vierte inmediatamente en tu taza para detener el proceso de preparación.

what_to_expect.description: Stumptown's French Press method uses a longer extraction time and coarse grind to create a rich, full-bodied cup with deep flavors. The wooden spoon prevents scratching and the extended steep time ensures complete extraction.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Stumptown's method uses a coarse grind and a longer 6-minute steep. This patience rewards you with a rich, full-bodied cup and deep flavors.
what_to_expect.description_es: El método de dos vertidos de Stumptown permite control sobre la extracción. La primera fase extrae acidez, la segunda desarrolla cuerpo.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Stumptown usa dos vertidos para control de extracción. La primera fase extrae acidez y notas brillantes, la segunda desarrolla cuerpo y dulzura.

notes: Stumptown's French Press method uses a longer extraction time and coarse grind to create a rich, full-bodied cup with deep flavors. The wooden spoon prevents scratching and the extended steep time ensures complete extraction.
notes_es: Método Stumptown con dos fases de vertido para control de extracción.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 28g de café a molienda gruesa.
